Gesper heard the distinctive noise that announced a commline request.

Gesper: Hoist? I think there's a message waiting.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "warriorazure" <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:
> Melchana: Stupid freakin' autobots... Can't you answer when you're 
> being called?
> 
> She was getting impatient for an answer. She reopened the commline.
> 
> Melchana: HELLOOO!! Is anyone there? I want to talk to Gesper, so 
> move your mechabutts and get him here!!!
> 
> Gesper, in the Autobot base, was intensely fixating the engine room.
